typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string,
		CountryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empData
empData derive(empName = upper(empName),
		newColumn = iif(isNull(CountryName), 'Unknown', CountryName)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		empid,
		empName,
		age,
		Deptid,
		CountryNameNew = newColumn
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['newCountryEmp.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		empName,
		age,
		Deptid,
		CountryNameNew
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
